name: Electric Warrior (C64)
description:
For the Commodore 64 and emulators like VICE v3.x+:

The chosen child of NRAR, trained in the cosmic future art of 'rabbitfighting' (aka ghosting) teleports to Earth, year 9634, to recover an ancient and holy relic, lost years past after the cataclysmic shattering of its homeworld --- scattering its souls and sacred treasures throughout the interstellar universe.

The scene of planetfall - a dangerous and frighteningly dystopic future where madness and technology have joined in an electric world ruled by the mysterious Doktor Gigglesmith.

This child is you and your destiny is to become... the ELECTRIC WARRIOR.

With stunning soundtrack title music by sensational soundsmith Richard Bayliss. And game design by maverick mason Mo Dernart.
